findings.title: RewardPool#notifyRewardAmount() does not check if it received reward
findings.description: The notifyRewardAmount function in RewardPool contract does not verify if a reward was received, which can lead to issues.

findings.title: StakingRewards#notifyRewardAmount() can decrease rewardRate
findings.description: The notifyRewardAmount function does not check if the rewardRate decreases after notification, allowing admin to continuously decrease the reward rate by notifying with zero rewards.

findings.title: Numerators can be larger than denominators
findings.description: Multiple functions do not check if the numerator can be larger than the denominator, leading to contracts reverting on normal interactions.

findings.title: Controller#revokeStrategy() can be called on active strategy
findings.description: The revokeStrategy function can be called on an active strategy, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Unused Variables
findings.description: Controller#{split,max} is defined but not used in contract. Consider removing the variables.

findings.title: Remove Test events in StakingRewards
findings.description: The StakingRewards contract emits 'Test' events used for testing and should be removed before deployment.
